hyperParameters.name: dataset_id
hyperParameters.description: The name or descriptor of the data set.

hyperParameters.name: train_ids
hyperParameters.description: List of document ids for training set.

hyperParameters.name: val_ids
hyperParameters.description: List of document ids for validation set.

hyperParameters.name: best_model
hyperParameters.description: States if the best model should be loaded at the end.

hyperParameters.name: steps
hyperParameters.description: After this number of steps a checkpoint is made.

hyperParameters.name: batch_size
hyperParameters.description: The batch size for training and evaluation

hyperParameters.name: warmup_ratio
hyperParameters.description: The ratio of training steps used for warmup.

hyperParameters.name: adam_beta2
hyperParameters.description: Beta2 for AdamW optimizer. Setting this to 0.998 is recommended for large batch sizes.
